About me

My name is Miran

I am an enthusiastic web developer based in Warsaw, with a rich experience of over 2 years in CG, website & product design.

With these years of experience in computer graphics and web design I have mastered skills of understanding client requirements according to the latest trends.

I’ve spent most of these years learning and working across different areas of design like front-end development, landing pages, and UI/UX design. Having worked on various projects, I can help you with the best possible suggestions and ideas that we can proceed with.

Web-development
If you are looking for a developer who’ll take over the research and development of your website, I am a well-established specialist to help you with this.
UI/UX Design
An effective UI/UX is what captures attention and spreads a clear message. I make sure the design is innovative and neat with all of this.
Mobile web-app development
If you are looking for a user-friendly app that will attract more mobile users, I can help you to design it with the latest and trendiest look and feel.

about my education and experience
education & courses
Kozminski University
Bachelor degree | Warsaw (2019-2022)

I have sucessfully graduated from #1 Business School in CE Europe, leveraging studies in Management and Artificial Intelligence in Digital Society.

Having knowledge in various business areas starting from company Management, Digital Marketing, Cloud Tech in Business, and finishing with Data Science and programming of Artificial Intelligence using Python and applying it in business.

Udemy & LinkedIn learning courses
Web-developer | UI/UX designer | Targeting specialist

I am constantly learning, obtaining new skills and polishing the old ones. Since I was a teen I always wanted to create beautiful designs, so I started my journey from computer graphics (working with Adobe Illustator, Figma, and even 3D modelling with Blender).

Therefore, I decided to move on to design & development of the websites and mobile applications.

experience
Junior Data Engineer
Santander Global Technology & Operations | Warsaw (2023 - Present)

I automated validation processes using python (pandas, numpy), created various algorithms, which solve particular business problems, as well as reports generation algorithms for later business analysis.

I significantly improved my GIT conflicts solving, SQL skills working in corporate applications and created custom python packages which could be later used for data analysis.

I improved my soft and hard skills, as well as working in a group, using Agile methodologies, and achieving desired goals on time.

Front-end Developer
Freelance | Warsaw (2022 - Present)

I developed various websites designs and landing pages, and helped clients to fullfill theis mission and achieve their goals

I Learned how to automate processes, work with preprocessors, and how to use the best practices and apply modern development techniques to create beautiful and responsive websites

Moreover, I have mastered my designing skills. As a UI/UX Desiner, I competently used the rules of the composition of the web page, colour contrast and the emphasis of elements to attract the visitor's attention to the necessary components.

My tech

Tech Stack I use
HTML5
It's what builds the framework of your website or app, and version five will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure for your product.
CSS3
This style of language allows me to create absolutely any appearance of your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!
Java Script
This programming language allows you to animate anything: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, getting data from the server, and more
React
This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product just for your purposes
Node.js
This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - "brain" that will perform actions that the user does not see
jQuery
JQuery library will speed up development. We will not integrate it into the project unnecessarily, but the skill of working with it is present
Python
It is used for a variety of purposes, including web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, scientific computing, and automation.
